text: Charles Frédéric Petit was an archer from France. He was born on 6 May 1857 and died on 19 February 1947. Petit competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics.Frédéric PetitCharles Frédéric PETIT == References == Category:1857 births Category:1947 deaths Category:French archers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France
title: Charles Frédéric Petit
